ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when the Account record type is "Committee_Reviewer," and the Committee picklist is set to "EDRD Sub Committee" then Committee Name field is not left blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Committee__pc, "EDRD Sub Committee"), (ISPICKVAL(Committee__pc, "EDRD Advisory/ Sub Committee"))), ISPICKVAL(Committee_Name__pc, ""), OR(Record_Type_Name__c = 'Committee_Reviewer', Record_Type_Name__c = 'Provider') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Committee is EDRD Sub Committee OR EDRD Advisory/ Sub Committee then Committee Name cannot be blank.
